characters.name: Mr. Dursley
characters.description: A big, beefy man with hardly any neck and a large mustache. Director of Grunnings, a drill-making firm. Fearful, disapproves of imagination, and easily rattled.
characters.role: Husband of Mrs. Dursley, father of Dudley, and uncle to Harry Potter

characters.name: Mrs. Dursley
characters.description: Thin, blonde, with an unusually long neck. Stiff demeanor, sips tea through pursed lips, and pretends she doesn't have a sister (Mrs. Potter).
characters.role: Wife of Mr. Dursley, mother of Dudley, and aunt to Harry Potter

characters.name: Dudley
characters.description: Small son of the Dursleys, spoiled and behaves poorly. Learned the word
characters.role: Son of Mr. and Mrs. Dursley, cousin to Harry Potter

characters.name: Harry Potter
characters.description: A baby boy with jet-black hair and a lightning-shaped scar on his forehead. Survived an attack by Voldemort, causing his power to break. Unaware of his fame.
characters.role: The boy who lived, nephew of the Dursleys

characters.name: Albus Dumbledore
characters.description: Tall, thin, very old with silver hair and beard. Wears long robes, a purple cloak, half-moon spectacles, and has a long crooked nose. Calm, wise, and unafraid to say Voldemort's name.
characters.role: Headmaster of Hogwarts, leader in the wizarding world

characters.name: Professor McGonagall
characters.description: Severe-looking woman with square glasses, emerald cloak, and black hair in a tight bun. Anxious, concerned about rumors, and deeply affected by the Potters

characters.name: Hagrid
characters.description: A giant of a man with bushy black hair and beard. Wild in appearance, trusted friend of Dumbledore.

characters.name: Sirius Black
characters.description: Owner of a motorcycle lent to Hagrid. Not described in detail.

characters.description: Cat with markings around its eyes, gives Mr. Dursley a stern look. Later revealed to be Professor McGonagall.

setting.atmosphere: Mysterious, unsettling, and uneasy. Unusual events like owls flying in daylight, shooting stars, and people in cloaks whispering.
notable_features: Large tawny owl fluttering past the window
Owls behaving unusually in broad daylight
Street lamps being put out by Dumbledore
Neat hedges and low garden walls
Muggles unaware of wizarding world events
